sendMessages.label: Gawo lololeza liyenera kutumiza uthenga
sendMessages.tooltip: 0 amatanthauza kuti mamembala onse amatha kutumiza mauthenga, ndipo zokulirapo zomwe zikutanthauza kuti zilolezo zapamwamba ndizofunikira

invite.label: Gawo la chilolezo likufunika kuitanitsa mamembala atsopano
invite.tooltip: Set yemwe angapemphe mamembala atsopano kuchipinda

ban.label: Gawo lololeza lofunikira poletsa mamembala
ban.tooltip: Khazikitsani yemwe amatha kuletsa mamembala achipinda

roomSettings.label: Sinthanitsani chilolezo cha zigawo za chipinda

PermissionSettingsContent.description: Miyezo ya chilolezo: 0-100, zokulirapo ndizomwe zimatanthawuza
